duties_responsibilities.duty: Weld and fabricate massive steel structures such as large steel girders, beams, and nodes for skyscrapers and large power generation equipment.
Perform weld tests on 3 positions/1g, 2g, & 3g, using .045" 70 series flux cored wire and stringer weld passes only.
Qualifications: 3-5 years of industry experience, High School Diploma/GED, NCCER, and OSHA 10 certification preferred, and ability to pass a pre-employment drug screen.
